title: Polkadot resets DOT supply cap at 2.1 billion
body: Polkadot has passed a proposal to cap the supply of DOT tokens at 2.1 billion, which suggests lower emissions and greater scarcity moving forward. The company revealed that the initiative follows the approval of the referendum 1710 with 81% in favor. At the time of publication, only 1.6 billion DOT exist, accounting for only 76% of the eventual supply. The referendum 1710 replaced the current unlimited issuance model, which only minted 120 million DOT annually without a supply cap. Polkadot schedules a two-year inflation period for DOT tokens https://twitter.com/Polkadot/status/1967241017314115889 According to the new model. DOT tokens are scheduled for a two-year token inflation period. The firm also said new DOT issuances will step down every 2 years starting from Pi Day, March 14, 2026. The director of The Kus, the top news source for the Polkadot ecosystem, Jay Chrawnna, revealed that the date was important because it was near Bitcoin’s halving. He acknowledged that DOT will step down every two years and will be coordinated with Bitcoin’s halving every other step. Polkadot forecasts that there will be approximately 1.91 billion DOT by 2040 under Ref 1710’s model, compared to 3.4 billion under the current 120M per year model. The firm also expects to reach the 2.1B market cap around the year 2160. The company maintained that the model is focused on scarcity, enhancing predictability for investors, and strengthening long-term alignment across the ecosystem. Polkdadot’s OpenGrov framework enables referenda where token holders can submit proposals, cast votes, or delegate voting power. Under the new model, Polkadot proposes three schedules for reducing inflationary pressure, including one option to immediately cut emissions by more than half before easing off. The other options include applying sharper early reductions followed by a gradual decline through the next century. Polkadot Poland DAO OpenGov said the company is pleased to vote in favor, while simultaneously voting against other proposals regarding changes to the DOT economy. The company said it considers introducing a fixed supply as beneficial for Polkadot’s future and for setting it back on the right track. The firm added that it views the proposal positively because it will enforce a more prudent approach to spending DOT tokens. It also believes that the proposal makes the revenues DOT users can generate more realistic, thus making the DOT token significantly more valuable and robust in the long term. The initiative comes as co-founder Gavin Wood returns as CEO of Parity Technologies, the blockchain network’s development arm. Wood also framed the cap as part of a broader effort to prepare Polkadot for its 2.0 upgrade later this month. The initiative aims to reduce developer expenses while pushing throughput to new heights with creatures like Agile Coretime and Elastic Scaling. At the time of publication, DOT had dropped by nearly 5% to $4.18 following the announcement of capping the token’s supply. Despite the dip, the digital asset has surged by 4.12% in the last 7 days and increased by more than 6.65% in the past 30 days. Polkadot seeks to connect institutional investors using blockchain infrastructure As previously reported by Cryptopolitan, the company aims to strengthen its position against rivals like Ethereum through incentives such as Polkadot Capital Group. The firm launched the project on August 19, which is designed to connect institutional investors with Polkadot’s blockchain infrastructure. The initiative aims to help institutions explore crypto-related opportunities in areas like asset management, banking, venture capital, and exchanges. The crypto company said it created Polkadot Capital Group in response to rising institutional demand for digital assets and improving regulatory clarity. The project’s leader, David Sedacca, said the team is already pursuing partnerships with asset managers, brokers, and allocators. On-chain data shows that Polkadot’s trading volume over the past 24 hours is $235.3 million, representing a 51.5% decrease from the day before. Polkadot’s open interest has also dropped by 2.35% to $605 million, while its derivatives volume fell by 43% to $446.5 million. title: Bitcoin: Rising Wedge and 2 Bearish Divergence Flags Signal Near-Term Weakness
Fight.ID and UFC Broaden Web3 Partnership to Advance Digital Fan Experiences
body: Fightfi, the company behind the Web3 combat sports platform Fight.ID has announced an expanded partnership with the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) to develop blockchain-based fan engagement initiatives further. The collaboration aims to introduce new digital experiences for UFC's global audience, leveraging Web3 infrastructure to deepen participation and interaction. As a key partner of UFC Strike, the organization’s official digital collectibles platform, Fight.ID has been instrumental in building Web3 experiences for MMA fans over the past three years. The extended partnership will expand these efforts, including the rollout of a blockchain-powered loyalty system, a fighter prize pool mechanism, and a premium merchandise line exclusive to Fight.ID users. To support the next stage of development, Fight.ID recently closed a funding round with participation from both institutional and individual investors across the technology and sports sectors. Backers include Anthos Capital, Aptos Foundation, Aquanow Ventures, Blockchain Coinvestors, Fabric VC, Jupiter, and Memeland, alongside angel investors from the entertainment and professional sports worlds. Notable individual participants include UFC athletes Gilbert Burns, Josh Emmett, Dan Ige, Vicente Luque, Eric Nicksick, Alexandre Pantoja, and Gregory Rodrigues. Other investors include Craig Kallman, Chief Music Officer at Atlantic Music Group; former NBA All-Star Baron Davis; NFL Pro Bowler Cam Jordan; and Yat Siu, Chairman of Animoca Brands. Funds raised will be used to develop a range of digital products focused on ownership, programmable rewards, and immersive user interaction. These offerings will be designed around the platform’s foundational values: Fight Fair, Fight Together, Fight Through, and Fight Forever. “UFC has always embraced an innovation-first mentality. James and his team have proven to be a dynamic and innovative partner for us, and we are extremely excited to support the Fight.ID ecosystem over the next several years,” said Grant Norris-Jones, Executive Vice President, Head of Global Partnerships at TKO. According to the company, the enhanced partnership reflects UFC’s commitment to evolving fan experiences in step with broader digital trends, especially as mixed martial arts continues to expand its global reach. “As our world continues to become more digitally enabled, there is no better time than now to invest in blockchain projects. There’s also no better time to become a UFC fan as MMA continues to capture our cultural zeitgeist,” said James Zhang, Co-Founder and CEO of Fight.ID. “As fight fans, we have long admired UFC’s grit and innovation. Over the past three years, our teams have developed incredible trust and collaboration behind building UFC’s official digital collectibles. It’s time now to expand our offerings to invite all fight fans to join the tribe of digital ownership.” The announcement marks a further step in integrating blockchain into mainstream sports, with Fight.ID positioning itself at the forefront of digital fan engagement in combat sports. title: Solana Strategic Investment: Helius Unlocks Monumental $500M for Ecosystem Growth
body: BitcoinWorld Solana Strategic Investment: Helius Unlocks Monumental $500M for Ecosystem Growth The Solana ecosystem just received a monumental boost! Helius, a prominent Solana infrastructure startup, has successfully raised an astounding $500 million to launch a dedicated Solana strategic investment firm. This significant capital injection, reportedly from crypto giants Pantera Capital and Summer Capital, marks a pivotal moment for the future growth and development of the Solana blockchain, as SolidIntel confirmed. What Does This Monumental Solana Strategic Investment Mean? This isn’t just another funding round; it’s a game-changer for the entire Solana network. By establishing its own investment firm, Helius is positioning itself to directly nurture and accelerate promising projects building on the Solana blockchain. This strategic move signals deep confidence in Solana’s potential and aims to foster a more robust and innovative ecosystem. Direct Ecosystem Support: The new firm will actively seek out and invest in promising Solana-based projects. Accelerated Development: Funding will help startups overcome financial hurdles, allowing them to focus on innovation and growth. Increased Adoption: A thriving ecosystem with more decentralized applications (dApps) and services naturally attracts more users to Solana. Who is Helius, and Why is Solana Strategic Investment So Crucial? Helius is a leading infrastructure provider for Solana, offering essential developer tools and APIs that simplify building on the blockchain. They possess an intimate understanding of the Solana ecosystem’s nuances and needs. Their decision to launch a dedicated Solana strategic investment firm underscores their unwavering commitment and belief in the platform’s long-term viability and scalability. Solana itself is renowned for its high transaction speeds and remarkably low costs, making it an attractive foundation for a wide array of decentralized applications, ranging from decentralized finance (DeFi) to non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and blockchain gaming. However, like any rapidly evolving technology, it requires continuous investment and development to fully realize its vast potential. Pantera Capital and Summer Capital: Fueling Solana’s Future The involvement of Pantera Capital and Summer Capital adds immense credibility and substantial financial muscle to this venture. Pantera Capital is a well-established and respected name in the blockchain investment space, with a proven history of backing highly successful crypto projects. Summer Capital, while perhaps less publicly visible, also brings significant resources and strategic insights to the table. Their combined commitment of half a billion dollars highlights a shared and ambitious vision for Solana’s future. This isn’t merely about achieving financial returns; it’s about strategically cultivating a vibrant developer community and fostering an innovative application landscape on Solana. How Will This Investment Shape Solana’s Landscape? The newly formed investment firm will likely focus on several key areas to bolster and expand the Solana ecosystem: Early-Stage Startups: Providing crucial seed funding and mentorship for groundbreaking ideas. Infrastructure Projects: Investing in foundational tools and services that enhance Solana’s core capabilities and reliability. User Experience Initiatives: Supporting projects that make Solana more accessible, intuitive, and user-friendly for a broader audience. Security Enhancements: Funding cutting-edge research and development into making the network even more robust and secure against threats. This proactive approach by Helius, backed by such significant capital, could lead to a rapid acceleration of development and adoption across the Solana network. It creates a powerful and positive feedback loop: more investment attracts top-tier talent, which in turn leads to the creation of better projects, ultimately attracting more users and further investment into the ecosystem. Challenges and the Road Ahead for Solana Strategic Investment While the outlook is overwhelmingly positive, launching and effectively managing a large investment firm, especially within the highly dynamic and often unpredictable crypto space, comes with its own unique set of challenges. Factors such as market volatility, evolving regulatory uncertainties, and the intensely competitive landscape will all play a significant role in its journey. However, with Helius’s deep technical understanding of Solana and the robust financial backing of experienced investors, the firm is exceptionally well-positioned to navigate these complexities. The overarching goal is clear: to identify and empower the next generation of Solana-based innovators, ensuring the network continues its impressive trajectory towards widespread adoption and innovation. In conclusion, Helius’s successful $500 million raise to establish a Solana strategic investment firm is a powerful testament to the growing confidence and belief in Solana’s ecosystem. This substantial capital, fueled by Pantera Capital and Summer Capital, is set to ignite a new wave of innovation and development, promising an exciting and prosperous future for the high-performance blockchain. It’s a clear signal that the institutional world is keenly watching and actively investing in Solana’s potential to redefine decentralized applications. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Helius? A1: Helius is a leading infrastructure startup that provides developer tools and APIs to simplify building applications on the Solana blockchain. Q2: Who are Pantera Capital and Summer Capital? A2: Pantera Capital is a prominent blockchain investment firm, and Summer Capital is another significant investor, both contributing to Helius’s $500 million raise. Q3: What is a Solana strategic investment firm? A3: It’s an investment firm specifically created to fund and support projects and startups building on the Solana blockchain, aiming to foster ecosystem growth. Q4: How will this funding impact the Solana ecosystem? A4: The funding is expected to accelerate development, attract new talent, support innovative projects, and ultimately increase adoption and utility within the Solana network. Q5: What types of projects will the firm invest in? A5: The firm will likely invest in early-stage startups, infrastructure projects, user experience initiatives, and security enhancements within the Solana ecosystem. title: Remarkable Stock Market Performance: What It Means for Crypto Investors
body: BitcoinWorld Remarkable Stock Market Performance: What It Means for Crypto Investors In the dynamic world of finance, where every market move sends ripples, the latest update from the U.S. stock indexes offers a fascinating insight. As a cryptocurrency investor, you might wonder, “Why should I care about traditional stocks?” The truth is, the overall Stock Market Performance often serves as a significant barometer for broader investor sentiment, which can, in turn, influence the volatile crypto landscape. Let’s dive into what these gains mean for you. Understanding the Positive Stock Market Performance Today, the three major U.S. stock indexes opened higher, signaling a robust start to the trading day. This positive momentum often reflects growing investor confidence and a ‘risk-on’ appetite, which can be a good sign for assets across the board, including cryptocurrencies. S&P 500: +0.34% – This broad market index, representing 500 of the largest U.S. publicly traded companies, is often seen as a bellwether for the overall economy. Its rise suggests widespread optimism. Nasdaq Composite: +0.45% – Heavily weighted towards technology and growth stocks, a strong Nasdaq indicates investor enthusiasm for innovation and future earnings potential, areas often paralleled in the crypto space. Dow Jones Industrial Average: +0.03% – Comprising 30 significant U.S. companies, the Dow’s positive opening, while modest, contributes to the overall bullish sentiment. Such a collective uplift in Stock Market Performance usually points to favorable economic conditions or positive news driving market participants. How Does Strong Stock Market Performance Influence Crypto? While often seen as distinct, the cryptocurrency market doesn’t operate in a vacuum. It frequently correlates with traditional markets, especially during periods of significant macroeconomic shifts. When investors feel confident in traditional assets like stocks, they might be more willing to allocate capital to higher-risk, higher-reward assets like Bitcoin and altcoins. This phenomenon is often referred to as a ‘risk-on’ environment. In such times, investors are less inclined to hold onto safe-haven assets and more eager to seek growth. Conversely, a downturn in Stock Market Performance can lead to a ‘risk-off’ sentiment, prompting investors to pull funds from speculative assets, including crypto. For example, if tech stocks are performing well, it can sometimes spill over into excitement for blockchain technology and digital assets, as both sectors are perceived as future-oriented and innovative. Therefore, monitoring the traditional markets provides valuable context for your crypto investment strategy. Navigating the Nuances: Challenges and Opportunities from Stock Market Performance However, the relationship isn’t always straightforward. There are times when crypto markets might decouple from traditional stocks, driven by unique factors such as regulatory news, specific technological advancements, or major network upgrades within the crypto ecosystem. This divergence highlights the unique characteristics of digital assets. Despite potential decoupling, a consistently strong Stock Market Performance generally fosters a positive backdrop. It suggests that liquidity is ample and investors are generally in a buying mood. This can create opportunities for crypto investors to see renewed interest and capital inflows into their digital portfolios. It’s crucial to remember that while correlations exist, each market has its own drivers. Therefore, relying solely on stock market indicators for crypto decisions can be risky. A holistic approach, combining macro-economic analysis with crypto-specific fundamentals, is always recommended. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors Amidst Positive Stock Market Performance So, what can you, as a crypto investor, take away from today’s positive stock market opening? Monitor Investor Sentiment: Use strong stock market days as an indicator of overall market optimism. This might signal a more favorable environment for crypto. Watch for Capital Flow: Observe if this positive sentiment translates into increased trading volumes or price action in major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Diversify Wisely: Even with positive traditional market trends, maintain a diversified crypto portfolio to mitigate risks inherent in the digital asset space. Stay Informed: Continue to research crypto-specific news and developments, as these can override broader market trends. Ultimately, understanding the broader financial landscape, including Stock Market Performance , empowers you to make more informed decisions. It’s about connecting the dots between seemingly disparate markets to gain a comprehensive view. Today’s higher opening in the U.S. stock indexes is a compelling reminder of the interconnectedness of global financial markets. While cryptocurrencies have their own unique drivers, a positive Stock Market Performance often sets an optimistic tone for investors, potentially spilling over into the digital asset space. By staying informed about both traditional and crypto markets, you can better anticipate trends and position your portfolio for success. The journey of understanding these intricate relationships is truly remarkable , offering a deeper perspective on your investment decisions. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does ‘risk-on’ sentiment mean in financial markets? A1: ‘Risk-on’ sentiment refers to a market environment where investors are more willing to take on higher-risk assets, such as stocks and cryptocurrencies, in pursuit of greater returns. This often occurs during periods of economic optimism. Q2: How closely does Stock Market Performance correlate with cryptocurrency prices? A2: The correlation varies. Historically, during periods of high economic uncertainty, both markets might fall together. In bullish times, strong stock market performance can often coincide with crypto gains due to shared investor sentiment and liquidity. However, specific crypto events can cause divergence. Q3: Should I adjust my crypto strategy solely based on stock market movements? A3: While stock market performance offers valuable context, it should not be the sole basis for your crypto strategy. Cryptocurrencies have unique drivers, including technological developments, regulatory changes, and community sentiment. A balanced approach considering both macro and crypto-specific factors is advisable. Q4: Which stock index is most relevant for crypto investors to watch? A4: Many crypto investors pay close attention to the Nasdaq Composite due to its heavy weighting in technology and growth stocks. These sectors often share investor enthusiasm with innovative assets like cryptocurrencies. Q5: What are some signs that crypto might decouple from traditional Stock Market Performance? A5: Decoupling can be indicated by significant crypto-specific news (e.g., major adoption announcements, regulatory shifts, or technological breakthroughs) that cause crypto prices to move independently of traditional stock market trends. If you found this analysis helpful, consider sharing it with your network! Understanding the interplay between traditional finance and the crypto world is crucial for navigating today’s markets. Share this article on social media to help others gain valuable insights into how Stock Market Performance can influence their crypto investments. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Remarkable Stock Market Performance: What It Means for Crypto Investors first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

Exciting ZKC Perpetual Futures: Binance Unleashes New Trading Opportunities
body: BitcoinWorld Exciting ZKC Perpetual Futures: Binance Unleashes New Trading Opportunities The cryptocurrency world is always buzzing with new developments, and today brings an exciting announcement from Binance, one of the largest crypto exchanges globally. Binance has confirmed the listing of ZKC perpetual futures , a move set to ignite significant interest among traders. This new trading pair, ZKC/USDT, will go live at 2:00 p.m. UTC today, offering substantial leverage opportunities. What Exactly Are ZKC Perpetual Futures, Anyway? For those new to the concept, perpetual futures are a type of derivative contract that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without an expiration date. Unlike traditional futures, they do not expire, hence the term ‘perpetual’. This means traders can hold their positions for as long as they wish, provided they maintain sufficient margin. The upcoming listing involves ZKC perpetual futures , indicating that ZKC is a new or emerging cryptocurrency project that will now be accessible for derivatives trading on Binance. This provides a way for traders to gain exposure to ZKC’s price movements without actually owning the underlying asset. A key feature of this listing is the availability of up to 75x leverage. Leverage allows traders to open larger positions with a relatively small amount of capital. While this can amplify potential profits, it also significantly magnifies potential losses, making it a double-edged sword that requires careful consideration. Why Is This Binance Listing a Significant Development? Binance’s decision to list ZKC perpetual futures is a powerful signal of confidence in the ZKC project and its potential market demand. As a leading exchange, Binance brings immense liquidity and a vast user base to any asset it lists. This listing will likely: Boost ZKC’s Visibility: A listing on Binance’s perpetual futures market dramatically increases ZKC’s exposure to a global audience of professional and retail traders. Enhance Liquidity: More trading activity means deeper order books, making it easier for traders to enter and exit positions without significant price slippage. Offer Flexible Trading Strategies: Traders can now go long (bet on price increases) or short (bet on price decreases) on ZKC, allowing for more sophisticated strategies to capitalize on market volatility. Attract Institutional Interest: High-leverage products on reputable exchanges can sometimes draw attention from larger trading firms looking for new opportunities. This move underscores Binance’s continuous effort to expand its offerings and provide diverse trading instruments to its users. It also reflects the growing maturity and innovation within the decentralized finance (DeFi) and broader crypto ecosystem, where new projects like ZKC are constantly emerging. Navigating the Risks: What Traders Need to Know About High Leverage? While the opportunity to trade ZKC perpetual futures with up to 75x leverage sounds appealing, it comes with substantial risks that every trader must understand. High leverage can lead to rapid and significant losses, potentially wiping out an entire trading account in volatile market conditions. Consider these critical aspects: Magnified Losses: A small adverse price movement can result in a large percentage loss on your leveraged position. Liquidation Risk: If your position moves against you and your margin falls below a certain threshold, your position will be automatically liquidated by the exchange to prevent further losses, often at an unfavorable price. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies, especially newer ones, are known for their extreme price swings. These fluctuations are amplified when trading with high leverage. Funding Rates: Perpetual futures contracts involve funding rates, which are periodic payments exchanged between long and short traders to keep the contract price close to the spot price. These can eat into your profits or add to your costs. Therefore, approaching leveraged trading with a robust risk management strategy is not just advisable, but essential for protecting your capital. Actionable Insights for Trading ZKC Perpetual Futures Responsibly For traders looking to engage with ZKC perpetual futures , a thoughtful approach is crucial. Here are some actionable insights to help navigate this new opportunity: Start Small: Do not commit a large portion of your capital, especially when first experimenting with a new asset and high leverage. Begin with a small position to understand the market dynamics. Implement Stop-Loss Orders: Always use stop-loss orders to automatically close your position if the price moves beyond a predetermined level, limiting potential losses. Conduct Thorough Research: Understand what ZKC is, its underlying technology, use cases, team, and market sentiment before trading. Don’t just trade on hype. Educate Yourself on Perpetual Futures: If you’re unfamiliar with these derivatives, take the time to learn how they work, including margin requirements, funding rates, and liquidation mechanisms. Manage Your Risk: Only risk capital you can afford to lose. Avoid emotional trading and stick to a predefined trading plan. By adopting a disciplined and informed approach, traders can better position themselves to potentially benefit from the new ZKC perpetual futures listing while mitigating the inherent risks. A New Chapter for ZKC and Binance Traders The listing of ZKC perpetual futures on Binance marks an important milestone for both the ZKC project and the broader crypto derivatives market. It offers a fresh avenue for traders to engage with a new asset, providing opportunities for capital growth through leveraged positions. However, the allure of high leverage must always be balanced with a clear understanding of the magnified risks involved. As the market goes live today at 2:00 p.m. UTC, traders are encouraged to exercise caution, employ sound risk management practices, and stay informed. The crypto market is dynamic and full of possibilities, but successful navigation requires both knowledge and prudence. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What are ZKC perpetual futures? ZKC perpetual futures are derivative contracts that allow traders to speculate on the price movements of the ZKC cryptocurrency without owning the actual asset. They differ from traditional futures because they do not have an expiration date, enabling traders to hold positions indefinitely, subject to margin requirements. What does ‘up to 75x leverage’ mean? Up to 75x leverage means you can open a trading position worth 75 times the amount of capital you actually put down as margin. For example, with $100 of your own capital, you could control a position worth $7,500. While this can amplify profits, it also equally magnifies losses. When will ZKC perpetual futures be available for trading on Binance? Binance announced that ZKC/USDT perpetual futures will be listed and available for trading starting today, at 2:00 p.m. UTC. What are the main risks of trading ZKC perpetual futures with high leverage? The primary risks include significant potential for amplified losses, liquidation of your entire position if the market moves against you, and exposure to the high volatility inherent in cryptocurrency markets. Funding rates can also impact your profitability. How can I mitigate risks when trading ZKC perpetual futures? To mitigate risks, it is crucial to use stop-loss orders, start with small position sizes, thoroughly research the ZKC project, understand the mechanics of perpetual futures, and never risk more capital than you can comfortably afford to lose. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Stay informed and help others understand the exciting yet complex world of crypto derivatives. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the digital asset landscape and future price action . This post Exciting ZKC Perpetual Futures: Binance Unleashes New Trading Opportunities first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Crypto business operators face prison time in new bill proposed in Poland
body: Anyone providing crypto services without permission may spend time in prison, on top of a hefty fine, according to a draft provision put forward by lawmakers in Poland. The proposal comes ahead of a second reading of the country’s upcoming cryptocurrency legislation that has already drawn serious criticism for threatening the survival of domestic platforms. Controversial text set to enter Poland’s crypto law Dealing with cryptocurrencies may soon become a risky undertaking in Poland, where a proposed legislative amendment seeks to hit unlicensed crypto operations with monetary penalties and even prison sentences. The new provision, suggested by three parliamentarians from the center-right conservative Civic Platform party, may completely block the development of the Web3 sector, leading Polish crypto news portal Bitcoin.pl warned in a report on Monday. The text, submitted by Joanna Frydrych, Dorota Marek and Krystyna Skowrońska, reads: “Whoever, without being authorized to do so, conducts activities related to the provision of services in the field of crypto assets … shall be subject to a fine of up to PLN 5,000,000 or imprisonment for up to 5 years, or both.” The total in Polish złoty, equal to nearly $1.4 million, is a massive amount for small local crypto businesses. The other potential punishment is also very harsh. Prison sentences cannot be shorter than 6 months, the article highlighted. The Sejm, the lower house of parliament in Poland, approved the bill on first reading earlier this summer and referred it to the Public Finance Committee for further refinement. The long-awaited legislation seeks to transpose the European Union’s new rules under the Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulation into national law. Both have been already criticized by members of the Polish crypto community. In August, a report predicted that MiCA compliance costs will close down up to 90% of exchanges in the country, Eastern Europe’s largest crypto market. They may have to spend up to 3 million złoty (around $800,000) on obtaining a license alone. Representatives of the crypto sector have complained that the draft law goes even beyond the MiCA standards. One of the debated proposals was to impose a 0.5% fee on the revenues of domestic coin trading platforms, which is not required by the EU. Cryptocurrency bill stirs Polish society Besides the crypto industry, opposition politicians have also attacked the government’s regulatory move. Among them, Law and Justice party lawmakers Janusz Kowalski and Michał Moskal, who recently proposed to cap the licensing fee at €10,000 (less than $12,000) Poland’s newly elected President Karol Nawrocki, who assumed office last month, is expected to veto the law if it’s adopted in its current form, as previously reported by Cryptopolitan. Commenting on the latest addition to the draft, Polish economist Prof. Krzysztof Piech alleged that the new provision can result in strange situations, when people who simply train their friends to work with cryptocurrencies are punished. It can also prevent stores from accepting crypto payments or Polish artists from issuing non-fungible tokens (NFTs), noted the prominent academic who focuses on finance. Piech, who is the head of the Blockchain Technology Center at Warsaw’s Lazarski University, was also quoted as stating: “This regulation is a legal nightmare. It uses a nuclear weapon designed to combat large, unlicensed exchanges and targets ordinary people with it – hobbyists, artists, lecturers, and small entrepreneurs.” Introducing a minimum prison sentence for acts, the “criminal” nature of which is often the result of ignorance and unclear definitions (and lack of money for lawyers), is a hallmark of totalitarian systems, “not a rule of law,” he insisted. According to Jacek Walewski, the author of the article and an organizer of public crypto consultations at the Sejm, it’s hard to understand what Polish politicians want. “Their ideas for regulating the cryptocurrency market in Poland are becoming increasingly bizarre! It’s as if MPs want to discourage Poles from using cryptocurrencies,” he concluded. Sign up to Bybit and start trading with $30,050 in welcome gifts

title: Dogecoin Pulls Back But Ichimoku Alignment Signals Strength; See Why
body: Dogecoin recently faced a slight pullback after hitting a fresh high, yet its overall momentum remains firmly intact. Key Ichimoku indicators continue to align in favor of the bulls, reinforcing the strength behind the trend. Pullback Fails To Shake Bullish Structure Trader Tardigrade, an analyst on X, noted in a recent update that Dogecoin (DOGE) has seen a pullback after reaching its recent high. Despite this retracement, the overall structure remains firm, suggesting that the market still favors strength on the higher timeframes. Related Reading: Dogecoin In Buy Zone: Bulls Eye $0.34 As Immediate Target According to the analysis, the Ichimoku indicators continue to show strong alignment. This setup reinforces the bullish outlook, as the cloud and key lines continue to support ongoing momentum. The update also highlighted that five previous long trades remain highly profitable. With the bullish conditions holding, there has been no reason to exit these positions yet. The consistency of these profitable trades underscores the reliability of the Ichimoku signals in tracking Dogecoin’s performance. However, the analyst made it clear that profit-taking will only be triggered by a bearish signal. Specifically, attention is on the potential for a Tenkan-sen/Kijun-sen cross, the Conversion line moving below the Base line, which would indicate a shift in momentum. Key Levels And Uptrend Score Furthermore, Trader Tardigrade outlined the key support levels for DOGE based on Ichimoku analysis. The Kijun-sen offers immediate support at $0.24770, while a broader support zone lies between $0.21517 and $0.22400 at the Kumo cloud. These levels are seen as critical areas where buyers may step in to maintain the bullish structure. Related Reading: Dogecoin Bullish Kumo Breakout, But Can DOGE Overcome The $0.23804 Barrier? The analyst also noted the significance of the Kumo cloud’s current color, which is green. This reflects a bullish bias in the market and adds another layer of confirmation to the ongoing uptrend. With the cloud trending positively, momentum appears to favor the bulls. Breaking down the trends further, the short-term outlook shows price trading above the Kijun-sen, signaling continued upward pressure. In the mid-term, DOGE remains above the Kumo cloud, further strengthening the case for sustained bullish momentum. On the long-term chart, the Chikou Span is positioned above the price, which reinforces the broader uptrend. Altogether, these conditions result in an overall Ichimoku score of +4, indicating a strong uptrend across multiple timeframes. Such alignment suggests that Dogecoin is well-positioned to extend its strength if support levels hold. In summary, the technical data presented by Trader Tardigrade corroborates his earlier assessment. DOGE’s current position, supported by a perfect alignment of bullish indicators and a total score of +4, confirms a strong uptrend. Featured image from iStock, chart from Tradingview.com

Massive Strategic Reliance Global Group Crypto Investment Announced
body: BitcoinWorld Massive Strategic Reliance Global Group Crypto Investment Announced Exciting news is rippling through both the traditional finance and digital asset sectors! Nasdaq-listed insurtech company Reliance Global Group (RELI) has just announced a groundbreaking plan to make a significant Reliance Global Group crypto investment . The company intends to purchase up to $120 million in various cryptocurrencies, signaling a bold step into the future of finance. Understanding the Reliance Global Group Crypto Investment Strategy This isn’t just a casual dip into the crypto waters; it’s a carefully planned, two-phase process. Reliance Global Group is demonstrating a strategic approach to integrating digital assets into its portfolio. What exactly does this involve? Targeted Assets: The company plans to acquire leading cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Solana (SOL). These selections highlight a focus on established and high-potential digital assets. Phased Approach: The investment will unfold in two distinct phases, suggesting a methodical execution rather than an abrupt market entry. This allows for flexibility and adaptation to market conditions. Expert Oversight: To manage this substantial Reliance Global Group crypto investment , the company has formed a dedicated cryptocurrency advisory board. This board will provide expert guidance, ensuring informed decisions and robust risk management. The establishment of an advisory board is a critical detail. It underscores the company’s commitment to due diligence and expertise in a rapidly evolving market. It’s a move that adds a layer of credibility and professionalism to their venture. Why Are Traditional Companies Embracing Crypto? The news of Reliance Global Group’s move isn’t isolated. We’re seeing an increasing trend of traditional companies, from tech giants to financial institutions, exploring or directly investing in cryptocurrencies. But what drives this shift? Several factors contribute to this growing interest: Diversification: Cryptocurrencies can offer an alternative asset class, helping companies diversify their portfolios and potentially reduce overall risk exposure to traditional markets. Inflation Hedge: Many view Bitcoin, in particular, as a potential hedge against inflation, similar to digital gold. Growth Potential: Despite volatility, digital assets have shown incredible growth potential over the past decade, attracting investors seeking higher returns. Technological Innovation: Investing in crypto also means engaging with cutting-edge blockchain technology, which can open doors to new business models and innovations. For an insurtech company like RELI, a Reliance Global Group crypto investment could also signify an exploration into future applications of blockchain within the insurance industry, such as smart contracts or decentralized insurance protocols. Navigating the Digital Frontier: Challenges and Opportunities While the opportunities are vast, entering the cryptocurrency market also comes with its own set of challenges. Any significant Reliance Global Group crypto investment must consider these factors: Market Volatility: Crypto markets are known for their price swings. A $120 million investment requires a strong stomach and a long-term perspective. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies is still evolving globally, presenting uncertainties that companies must navigate carefully. Security Concerns: Safeguarding large crypto holdings from hacks and cyber threats is paramount. The advisory board will likely play a key role in establishing robust security protocols. However, the potential rewards often outweigh these risks for companies willing to innovate. The ability to be an early mover in a transformative technology can provide a significant competitive advantage and position Reliance Global Group for future success in the digital economy. What’s Next for This Strategic Move? The announcement by Reliance Global Group is certainly a milestone. As the company proceeds with its two-phase acquisition process, the crypto community will be watching closely. Will this inspire more traditional firms to follow suit? This Reliance Global Group crypto investment could potentially: Boost investor confidence in the broader crypto market, especially among institutional players. Influence other insurtech companies to explore similar digital asset strategies. Solidify the role of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as preferred institutional investment vehicles. Ultimately, Reliance Global Group’s move is a testament to the growing mainstream acceptance and strategic importance of cryptocurrencies. It’s an exciting development that could pave the way for more traditional companies to embrace the decentralized future. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is Reliance Global Group (RELI)? Reliance Global Group (RELI) is a Nasdaq-listed insurtech company. It focuses on leveraging technology to innovate and improve the insurance industry. 2. Which cryptocurrencies will Reliance Global Group invest in? The company plans to acquire assets including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Solana (SOL) as part of its $120 million crypto investment strategy. 3. What is the role of the newly formed cryptocurrency advisory board? The cryptocurrency advisory board will manage the two-phase acquisition process, providing expert guidance and oversight for Reliance Global Group’s strategic crypto investment. 4. Why are traditional companies like RELI investing in cryptocurrencies? Companies are investing in crypto for various reasons, including portfolio diversification, potential hedging against inflation, seeking high growth potential, and engaging with innovative blockchain technology. 5. What are the potential challenges of a Reliance Global Group crypto investment? Key challenges include market volatility, an evolving regulatory landscape, and the need for robust security measures to protect digital asset holdings. Did you find this article insightful? Share your thoughts and spread the word about this significant development in the crypto space! title: Pundit: Buy More XRP Because $100 per XRP Will Happen Sooner Than You Think
body: JackTheRippler recently urged followers to “buy as many XRP as you can,” boldly predicting that the token will reach $100 per coin sooner than you think. The post quickly gained traction among crypto enthusiasts, but the numbers behind such a claim reveal how extraordinary that milestone would be. The $100 Target XRP’s current price is hovering around $2.99, with approximately 59.61 billion coins in circulation. This gives it a market capitalization of roughly $178 billion, positioning it as a significant player in the cryptocurrency market. A jump to $100 per token would push XRP’s market value to roughly $5.96 trillion. To put things into perspective, the overall cryptocurrency market currently sits at approximately $4 trillion. For comparison, Apple, the world’s largest publicly traded company, has a market capitalization of around $3.5 trillion, giving a sense of the scale involved with major digital assets and traditional market leaders. Achieving a $100 price would therefore require a single digital asset to surpass the size of the entire crypto market and any existing corporation. Buy as many #XRP as you can because $100 per XRP will happen sooner than you think! pic.twitter.com/lA7uRKqdlP — JackTheRippler ©️ (@RippleXrpie) September 14, 2025 Drivers Behind the Bullish Call JackTheRippler attributes his optimism to several factors: increasing regulatory clarity in the United States, Ripple’s ongoing product expansion, and broader institutional adoption of the XRP Ledger (XRPL). Recent legal developments have indeed reduced the regulatory cloud that long hung over Ripple. The protracted SEC v. Ripple case concluded last month after both parties withdrew their appeals , eliminating a major source of uncertainty. Ripple has also been expanding its ecosystem. The company unveiled RLUSD, its U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin, in December 2024, and activated the XRPL EVM sidechain around mid-2025, bringing smart contract features to the platform. Ripple continues to highlight hundreds of institutional customers using its payment solutions, underscoring XRP’s growing utility beyond simple speculation. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Reality Check on Scale and Timing While these developments strengthen the fundamental narrative for XRP, the leap from $3 to $100 is unprecedented. To sustain a multi-trillion-dollar market cap, XRP would need massive inflows of global capital, dramatic increases in liquidity, and a significant redistribution of token holdings. Crypto markets have demonstrated their capacity for dramatic shifts, yet sustaining such a valuation would necessitate a worldwide redistribution of wealth into a single digital asset. The Bottom Line JackTheRippler’s forecast captures the enthusiasm of a community that has long believed XRP will play a central role in global finance. The regulatory progress and Ripple’s product rollouts provide tangible reasons for optimism. Still, the mathematics of a $100 XRP illustrates the extraordinary scale of such a move. Investors should view the claim as a bold expression of bullish sentiment rather than an inevitable outcome. title: AI Revolutionizes Brand Protection: MarqVision’s Stunning $48M Funding Triumph
body: BitcoinWorld AI Revolutionizes Brand Protection: MarqVision’s Stunning $48M Funding Triumph In an era where digital authenticity is paramount, the fight against illicit online activities resonates deeply within communities accustomed to verifying every transaction. Just as the cryptocurrency world champions transparency and verifiable ownership, the realm of global commerce grapples with a shadow economy fueled by counterfeiting . This challenge, once seemingly insurmountable, is now being tackled head-on by innovative technologies. MarqVision, an AI-powered startup, recently made headlines by securing a monumental $48 million Series B round, marking a significant triumph in its mission to safeguard brands and redefine brand protection in the digital age. This story isn’t just about a successful funding round; it’s about a Harvard Law student’s audacious vision to leverage cutting-edge AI to solve a multi-trillion-dollar problem. The Trillion-Dollar Threat: Why Counterfeiting Demands a New Approach Imagine a global criminal enterprise worth over $3 trillion annually, accounting for approximately 8% of all global commerce. This isn’t a dystopian novel; it’s the staggering reality of counterfeiting, a pervasive issue that touches nearly every industry, from luxury fashion and pharmaceuticals to gaming and consumer electronics. Mark Lee, while a law student at Harvard, stumbled upon this colossal problem, a revelation that steered him away from a traditional legal career and onto an unexpected entrepreneurial path. He realized that traditional legal remedies were often too slow and reactive to combat an industry growing at 20% per year, especially as the COVID-19 pandemic pushed more commerce online, amplifying the problem across marketplaces and social media platforms. The impact of counterfeiting extends far beyond lost revenue for brands: Consumer Risk: Counterfeit goods can be dangerous, especially in sectors like pharmaceuticals, automotive parts, and electronics, posing significant health and safety risks. Brand Erosion: Fake products dilute brand value, damage reputation, and erode consumer trust. Economic Drain: It funnels money away from legitimate businesses, stifles innovation, and often funds other criminal activities. Legal Complexities: The global nature of counterfeiting makes legal enforcement incredibly challenging, requiring cross-border cooperation and sophisticated detection methods. Lee’s insight was clear: this universal problem required a universal, technological solution. His passion for computer vision became the foundation for MarqVision, a name cleverly combining ‘trademark’ (Marq) and ‘computer vision’ (Vision), signaling its core mission to combat trademark infringement and counterfeiting on an unprecedented scale. How AI Powers the Next Generation of Digital Guardians At the heart of MarqVision’s success lies its sophisticated application of AI , particularly computer vision technology. This isn’t just about simple image matching; it’s about developing intelligent systems capable of identifying nuanced patterns, logos, product features, and contextual clues that signify a counterfeit item or an infringing digital presence. The startup’s journey began with a focus on detecting and removing fake products online, a labor-intensive process traditionally requiring extensive human oversight. MarqVision’s AI-driven platform performs several critical functions: Automated Detection: Scans vast swathes of the internet – e-commerce sites, social media, forums – for unauthorized use of brand assets, including logos, product images, and copyrighted content. Deep Learning Analysis: Utilizes advanced deep learning models to understand product variations, identify subtle counterfeit characteristics, and even predict emerging infringement trends. Scalable Enforcement: Automates the process of sending takedown notices and managing disputes, significantly accelerating the removal of infringing content. Generative AI Integration: The fresh capital will further accelerate the integration of generative AI across its product suite, enhancing automation and predictive capabilities, potentially even generating synthetic data for better model training or assisting in legal document generation for enforcement. The shift toward leveraging AI for execution rather than just efficiency is a game-changer. As Mark Lee aptly points out, AI is expanding the total addressable market for software from mere efficiency tools into the actual execution of work, unlocking a market opportunity estimated at over $10 trillion. This fundamental transformation of service delivery is what attracted top-tier investors, seeing MarqVision not just as a software company, but as a leader in the burgeoning AI-led services space. A Monumental Leap: MarqVision’s Strategic Startup Funding Round Fast forward to 2025, and MarqVision has cemented its position as a formidable force in the brand protection landscape. The LA-headquartered AI startup recently closed a substantial $48 million Series B round, bringing its total capital raised to an impressive $90 million. This significant injection of startup funding underscores investor confidence in MarqVision’s technology, market traction, and ambitious vision. The funding round was led by prominent venture capital firms, including Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia Capital India & SEA), with strong participation from Salesforce Ventures, HSG (formerly Sequoia China), Coral Capital, and Michael Seibel, partner emeritus at Y Combinator. Returning backers like YC, Altos Ventures, and Atinum Investment also reaffirmed their commitment. This diverse group of investors highlights the global appeal and strategic importance of MarqVision’s mission. The allocation of the fresh capital is strategic and forward-looking: Allocation Amount (approx.) Purpose AI & Engineering Teams $24 Million Accelerate automation, integrate generative AI, enhance core technology. Enterprise Readiness $10 Million Scale platform for larger brands, develop features for enterprise clients. Regional Expansion $10 Million Enter new markets like Japan, strengthen presence in U.S., Korea, China, Europe. Operational Growth $4 Million General operational expenses, market penetration strategies. MarqVision’s rapid growth is a testament to its market fit, achieving $1 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR) within eight months, $10 million in three years, and recently crossing $20 million ARR after four years, consistently doubling annually. Their ambitious goal of reaching $100 million ARR by mid-2027 reflects their confidence in their scalable, AI-driven foundation and commitment to customer experience. Beyond Detection: The Evolution of Holistic Brand Protection MarqVision’s journey began with a focus on fighting counterfeits, but its vision has expanded significantly. The company recognized that true brand protection extends beyond mere detection and removal of infringements. It’s about empowering brands with comprehensive control over their digital presence and, crucially, helping them recover lost revenue. Initially, Mark Lee envisioned a $5 billion software company, selling specialized tools to IP teams. However, mentorship from YC partner Michael Seibel pushed him to think bigger – to reimagine the entire workflow for IP and brand professionals. This led MarqVision to pivot towards end-to-end managed services, an opportunity Lee now believes is 100 times larger than his original plan. This holistic approach to brand protection encompasses: Infringement Detection & Removal: Identifying and eliminating counterfeits, unauthorized resellers, impersonations, and copyright violations across e-commerce, social media, and chat platforms. Revenue Recovery: Many clients report a roughly 5% boost in sales after implementing MarqVision’s platform, making it valuable not only to legal teams but also to go-to-market organizations focused on revenue impact. Digital Presence Control: Giving companies the tools to actively manage how their brand appears and is represented across all digital channels. Brand Intelligence: Future roadmap includes offering deeper insights into supply chains, pricing strategies, and reseller networks, providing actionable data for strategic business decisions. This redefinition of ‘services’ by AI, bringing software-like scalability and efficiency, has captivated investors. MarqVision is transforming what was once considered an unappealing category in technology into a dynamic, high-growth sector, drawing strong competition in its latest funding round. Securing Tomorrow’s Assets: The Future of Intellectual Property with AI The proliferation of digital content and e-commerce has made safeguarding intellectual property more complex and critical than ever before. Traditional methods are simply insufficient to keep pace with the scale and sophistication of modern infringers. MarqVision’s success story is a powerful illustration of how AI is not just augmenting human capabilities but fundamentally transforming the landscape of IP enforcement and management. Mark Lee’s ambitious vision is clear: “Our vision is to be the backbone of every global brand that owns IP – becoming the AI-led services platform for IP, content, and brand professionals worldwide.” This goes beyond simply protecting trademarks; it encompasses a broader commitment to securing all forms of intellectual property in an increasingly digital and borderless world. As companies expand their digital footprints, the need for robust, AI-powered solutions to monitor, protect, and manage their IP assets will only intensify. The implications of MarqVision’s approach for the future of intellectual property are profound: Proactive Protection: Moving from reactive takedowns to proactive identification and mitigation of threats. Global Scalability: Enabling brands to protect their IP seamlessly across diverse international markets and platforms. Data-Driven Insights: Providing valuable intelligence that helps brands understand the infringement landscape and adapt their strategies. Empowering Professionals: Freeing up legal and brand teams from tedious manual tasks, allowing them to focus on higher-value strategic work. As the digital economy continues to evolve, powered by innovations in AI and global connectivity, the importance of robust intellectual property protection will only grow. MarqVision stands at the forefront of this evolution, demonstrating how a visionary approach, backed by powerful technology and strategic startup funding , can tackle some of the most persistent and costly challenges facing global commerce today. MarqVision’s journey from a Harvard Law revelation to a leading AI-driven brand protection powerhouse is a testament to the transformative power of technology when applied to real-world problems. By securing $48 million in a strategic funding round, the company is poised to accelerate its mission, integrating advanced AI and expanding its global reach. This triumph not only signifies a major milestone for MarqVision but also heralds a new era for brand protection, where AI doesn’t just assist but leads the charge against counterfeiting and infringement, safeguarding brand integrity and boosting revenue for businesses worldwide. It’s a clear signal that the future of digital commerce will be built on robust, intelligent defenses. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features. This post AI Revolutionizes Brand Protection: MarqVision’s Stunning $48M Funding Triumph first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: AI predicts Bitcoin price for October 1, 2025
body: While the Bitcoin ( BTC ) struggles to turn the key $115,000 threshold into support, it has managed to climb more than two percent in the past week. Over the last month, however, Bitcoin has shed 2.58%, moving in a wide range between $107,000 and $119,000. Finbold’s AI prediction agent has projected that Bitcoin will trade at $118,167 by October 1, 2025, suggesting a gain of 2.7% from today’s price of $115,056. At present, BTC is changing hands just over three thousand dollars below the forecasted level. To reach this projection, Finbold’s AI agent drew on several large language models, including GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4, and Grok 3. By blending outputs from multiple models, the system delivers an averaged forecast designed to iron out inconsistencies and provide a more reliable view of the market. Finbold’s AI prediction agent BTC forecast. Source: Finbold The analysis also incorporated momentum-based indicators such as MACD, RSI, Stochastic oscillator, MACD slope, and the 50- and 200-day simple moving averages. Within this framework, Grok 3 suggested the most optimistic path with a 2.99% rise, while GPT-4o leaned more conservatively at 2.12%. BTC market activity Market activity remains robust alongside these forecasts. Trading volume in the past twenty-four hours reached $46.66 billion, marking a 48% increase. Bitcoin’s fully diluted valuation currently stands at $2.4 trillion, with a volume-to-market cap ratio of 2.02%. This backdrop is further shaped by the wider digital asset landscape. The Altcoin Index has climbed to 72 out of 100, a local high that reflects rising appetite for alternatives, even as Bitcoin dominance has slipped to near a seven-month low. Market commentators are paying close attention to these dynamics. Well-known analyst Michaël van de Poppe described the current setup as “very classic price action prior to the FOMC meeting.” He noted that it is common for both Bitcoin and altcoins to correct into the event, stressing that dips in this phase can be opportunities rather than causes for panic. In his view, Bitcoin is now confronting its final resistance before a potential breakout. “Breaking through the $117.5K–$118K and we’ll be going towards a new ATH,” he said. #Bitcoin faces the final resistance before we're going to be seeing a new all-time high. Breaking through the $117.5K-118K and we'll be going towards a new ATH. Important week, really looking forward to the volatility of this week! pic.twitter.com/4U9Gr0guS0 — Michaël van de Poppe (@CryptoMichNL) September 15, 2025 The convergence of AI-based predictions, traditional technical indicators, and trader sentiment places heavy emphasis on the $117,500 to $118,000 zone. If Bitcoin manages to decisively clear this level, it would not only validate Finbold’s AI target but also open the door to a renewed push toward record highs. With market momentum building and volatility elevated ahead of the FOMC meeting, the coming weeks could prove decisive in shaping the next phase of Bitcoin’s trajectory. The post AI predicts Bitcoin price for October 1, 2025 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Big Change at Coinbase! Work Has Begun on the Base Token They Said "We Won't Release!" – Coinbase CEO Confuses People!
body: Jesse Pollak, one of the core developers of Base, the Ethereum-based Layer 2 network of Coinbase, the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the United States, said the project is exploring launching its own token. This move by Coinbase comes months after the Kraken-developed Ink network announced that it would be launching an INK token. These statements from Jesse Pollak mark a sharp reversal in Coinbase's previous rhetoric, as Coinbase representatives have consistently stated that they have no plans to issue a token for Base, which currently uses ETH as its gas token. The following statements were made in the post made by the X account: “Base begins exploring a network token We're in the early stages of exploration and don't have any details to share about timing, design, or governance. We're committed to taking the community with us and building in the open.” While Coinbase acknowledged that the Base network is researching a token, it added that it has no definitive plans to share at this time. Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong also confirmed the plans but shared that there is no certainty. “We are investigating a Base network token. It can be a great tool for accelerating decentralization in the ecosystem and expanding creator and developer growth. “Frankly, we don't have a definitive plan. We're just exploring it for now.” We’re exploring a Base network token. It could be a great tool for accelerating decentralization and expanding creator and developer growth in the ecosystem. To be clear, there are no definitive plans. We’re just updating our philosophy. As of now, we’re exploring it. https://t.co/BK3asbMpar — Brian Armstrong (@brian_armstrong) September 15, 2025 *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Big Change at Coinbase! Work Has Begun on the Base Token They Said "We Won't Release!" – Coinbase CEO Confuses People!

title: Trump plans major sanctions on Russian oil, but wants the EU to act first
body: The European Union is finalizing its 19th sanctions package against Russia, targeting everything from oil flows to crypto platforms to banking systems, according to Bloomberg. These new restrictions will also hit firms in China and India accused of helping Moscow move crude, as pressure builds from President Donald Trump, who over the weekend said he’s ready to slap “major” sanctions on Russia’s oil exports if the EU doesn’t stall again. Trump made it clear that the energy revenue funding Vladimir Putin’s war on Ukraine needs to be shut off, and quickly. “Europe has to move,” Trump said, warning that his administration’s sanctions will only kick in if European countries match the pressure. Crude imports from Russia have already plummeted in Europe, from 27% before the war to just 3% last year after 2022’s early sanctions, but natural gas is still flowing, especially to Hungary and Slovakia, which were granted temporary exemptions. The EU’s sanctions draft includes six Russian banks and energy firms, plus full blocking of Russia’s credit card systems, and a wave of new rules targeting crypto exchanges still doing business with the Kremlin. These platforms, mostly unnamed for now, are reportedly being used to move funds tied to Russian energy companies that are under older restrictions. The package also goes after refined products made from Russian crude, which would hit India and Turkey, two countries processing huge volumes of Moscow’s oil and sending diesel back into the European market. Trump pitches 100% tariffs while Hungary and India brace The United States has already pitched its plan to the Group of Seven. It includes tariffs of up to 100% on China and India, both of which continue buying oil from Russia. Trump’s team is pressing G7 leaders to act in “the coming weeks,” aiming to hammer the networks enabling Russia’s crude trade. For Brussels, this puts them in a tight spot: while they’ve criticized Moscow, they still rely heavily on Chinese markets and are trying to wrap up a trade deal with India. Hungary is especially exposed. Prime Minister Viktor Orban, who has spent the last three years doubling down on Russian energy, could lose a lot if the exemptions disappear. The country has also gone deep into Chinese manufacturing, especially in the electric vehicle and battery sectors. “The US can really give a checkmate to Orban on Russian energy, if it wants to,” said Andras Deak, a researcher at the National Public Service University in Budapest. Andras warned that companies like Mol Nyrt., which supplies Slovakia’s only refinery, could be crippled by direct energy sanctions. Even so, Hungary is starting to look around. Viktor just signed a 10-year deal with Shell Plc for 2 billion cubic meters of gas, symbolic, considering the country needs several times that every year. He also traveled to the UAE and Qatar on Friday to talk about alternative fuel supplies. Hungary’s past diversification efforts, including projects with Azerbaijan and a pipeline through Croatia, might help if Russian imports get cut off completely. On the Indian coast, another angle to the story played out as the Spartan, a Suezmax tanker carrying 1 million barrels of Russian Urals crude, approached Mundra port, operated by Adani Group. The vessel had already been sanctioned by both the EU and UK last year for facilitating Russian oil shipments. It’s now expected to be one of the last sanctioned ships to unload at Adani’s terminal before a new ban kicks in. Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd., the operator of Mundra, issued an internal advisory on September 11 stating that from now on, no vessel sanctioned by the US, EU, or UK will be allowed to dock. An Adani spokesperson confirmed Monday that the rule is immediate but doesn’t affect ships that were already heading toward the port when the rule was announced. The Spartan appears to fall into that category. Over the first eight months of this year, Mundra took in about 180,000 barrels per day of Russian oil, compared to the 1.6 million barrels daily flowing into India overall from Russia. That oil usually goes to refineries run by Indian Oil Corp. and HPCL-Mittal Energy Ltd. Don’t just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Ethereum Advantage: Why ETH-Holding Firms Are Poised for Superior Resilience
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Advantage: Why ETH-Holding Firms Are Poised for Superior Resilience The cryptocurrency market’s recent volatility has sent ripples through publicly listed companies holding digital assets. Many have seen their market net asset value (mNAV) dip below one, sparking concerns among investors. But what if there’s a strategic differentiator emerging in this challenging landscape? Standard Chartered’s Head of Crypto Research, Geoff Kendrick, highlights a significant Ethereum advantage for firms navigating these turbulent waters. Understanding the Shifting Sands: Why Firms Are Feeling the Squeeze In recent weeks, the market downturn has significantly impacted companies that have embraced cryptocurrencies as part of their balance sheets. Kendrick notes that their mNAV falling below one is a clear indicator of market pressure. This situation prompts a crucial question for corporate strategists: how can companies not only survive but thrive in an evolving digital asset ecosystem? Standard Chartered’s analysis suggests a divergence in resilience. While all crypto-holding firms face headwinds, those with an exposure to Ethereum (ETH) appear to possess inherent strengths that could position them more favorably for future growth and stability. This isn’t just about market capitalization; it’s about fundamental characteristics that provide a distinct Ethereum advantage . What Gives ETH Holders a Crucial Ethereum Advantage? Geoff Kendrick pinpoints several key factors that contribute to the superior resilience of companies holding Ethereum: Staking Yields: Ethereum’s transition to Proof-of-Stake allows holders to earn passive income through staking. This provides a consistent yield, offering a revenue stream that can offset market volatility and improve overall financial health. For a company, this isn’t merely a speculative holding but an income-generating asset. Regulatory Clarity: Compared to Bitcoin, Ethereum often benefits from a different regulatory perception, particularly in certain jurisdictions. As regulators worldwide work towards clearer frameworks, Ethereum’s ecosystem, with its diverse applications and ongoing development, might find itself in a more defined and therefore more secure position. This clarity reduces operational risk for institutional holders. Greater Room for Growth: Ethereum’s extensive utility, ranging from DeFi to NFTs and enterprise solutions, offers a broader scope for innovation and adoption. This inherent versatility suggests a larger potential for future value appreciation and ecosystem expansion, providing a substantial Ethereum advantage for long-term investors. These combined elements paint a picture of a more robust and adaptable asset for institutional portfolios, particularly when compared to Bitcoin’s primary function as a store of value. Mergers & Acquisitions: A Tale of Two Strategies The current market conditions, where mNAV is trading below one, could naturally lead to consolidation within the industry. Kendrick forecasts differing M&A strategies based on the primary crypto holding: For ETH-Holding Firms: The resilience offered by the Ethereum advantage , coupled with potential income from staking, could make these companies attractive acquisition targets. Buyers might see value in acquiring a firm with diversified crypto assets and a clear path to generating yield. For BTC-Holding Firms: Companies predominantly holding Bitcoin, such as MicroStrategy, might opt for a different approach. Instead of buying more Bitcoin in a downturn, Kendrick suggests they would be more inclined to acquire competitors. This strategy would allow them to consolidate market share and leverage existing infrastructure rather than simply increasing their exposure to a single asset type. This strategic divergence underscores the differing financial and operational implications of holding one asset over the other in a challenging market environment. Maximizing Your Institutional Crypto Strategy For firms considering or already holding cryptocurrencies, understanding these nuances is critical. The analysis from Standard Chartered provides actionable insights: Evaluate your portfolio: Consider the balance between speculative growth assets and income-generating ones. Ethereum’s staking mechanism offers a unique blend of both. Monitor regulatory shifts: Stay informed about global regulatory developments, as clarity can significantly impact asset valuation and operational feasibility. Look beyond price: While market price is important, factors like utility, ecosystem growth, and yield generation are increasingly vital for long-term institutional success. Embracing the Ethereum advantage means looking at the broader picture. The Future of Institutional Crypto Investment Standard Chartered’s perspective offers a compelling look into the evolving world of institutional crypto investment. The concept of an Ethereum advantage , rooted in staking yields, regulatory potential, and growth opportunities, presents a powerful argument for firms seeking resilience and strategic positioning. As the market matures, understanding these differentiators will be key to unlocking sustainable value and navigating the complexities of digital asset ownership. The future may indeed belong to those who strategically embrace the multifaceted benefits of Ethereum. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the core argument made by Standard Chartered regarding ETH and BTC? A1: Standard Chartered’s Geoff Kendrick argues that firms holding Ethereum (ETH) possess a significant “Ethereum advantage” over those holding Bitcoin (BTC) due to factors like staking yields, regulatory clarity, and greater growth potential, leading to more resilience in challenging market conditions. Q2: What specific benefits contribute to the “Ethereum advantage”? A2: The key benefits include the ability to earn passive income through Ethereum’s staking yields, a potentially clearer regulatory path compared to Bitcoin, and Ethereum’s broader ecosystem utility which offers more room for growth and innovation. Q3: How does the mNAV (market net asset value) relate to these predictions? A3: When the mNAV of crypto-holding firms falls below one, it indicates market pressure. Kendrick suggests that if this trend continues, it could trigger mergers and acquisitions, with ETH-holding firms being attractive targets and BTC-holding firms potentially acquiring competitors instead of more crypto. Q4: What different M&A strategies are predicted for ETH vs. BTC holders? A4: For ETH-holding firms, their resilience and yield generation could make them attractive acquisition targets. For BTC-holding firms, like MicroStrategy, the strategy might shift towards acquiring competitors to consolidate market share rather than increasing their Bitcoin holdings. Q5: Why is regulatory clarity considered a key advantage for Ethereum? A5: Regulatory clarity reduces operational risk and provides a more stable environment for institutional investors. As global regulations evolve, Ethereum’s ecosystem, with its diverse applications, may achieve a more defined and secure position, offering a competitive edge. Did this analysis shed light on your institutional crypto strategy? Share this article with your network on social media to spark a conversation about the evolving landscape of digital asset investments and the compelling Ethereum advantage ! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption . This post Ethereum Advantage: Why ETH-Holding Firms Are Poised for Superior Resilience first appeared on BitcoinWorld .
